ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:33:54 [Issue ID 4000-37618] urn:comicvine:4000-37618
ComicInfo.Summary:
The ZERO HOUR tie-in continues as another traveler--and familiar face--tells their tale. The Faerie Cluracan heads to Aurelian during a political upheaval and ends up causing an uproar of his own! "World's End" part 2.
Cluracan of Faerie tells a tale of a journey he made, before he got to the Worlds End. It includes Morpheus, an evil man and many other things.
Outer story (pgs 1, 2, 25):
Penciller: Bryan Talbot
Inker: Mark Buckingham
Inner story (pgs 3-24):
Penciller/Inker: John Watkiss
